name: CrazyHeadBall
description:
This is a simple local multiplayer soccer game that it was created by 2 inexpert programers. We need feedback to improve our game :)

In the future we'll add an Online Multiplayer mode.

In the game, before starting the match, you can click the Hiperpowers Button to choose the hiperpower that you want to play with it during the game.

Hiperpowers: AddedForce, LittleSpell, DoublePoints

Controls:

-P1:  Jump(W),Right(D),Left(A),Kick(S),ActivateHiperpower(E)

-P2: Jump(UpArrow),Right(RightArrow),Left(LeftArrow),Kick(DownArrow),  ActivateHiperpower(-)
